alert.note: Alert for Benton; Polk (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 3:51PM PST until December 29 at 3:02PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Benton and Polk Counties. Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Luckiamute River near Suver. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 27.0 feet, expect flooding of low lying and agricultural lands in the vicinity of Sarah Helmick State Park, Highway 99W, and Parker Road. Some secondary roads and rural access roads may be flooded at this point. Flooding along Buena Vista Rd near the confluence with the Willamette is also likely, especiallly if the Willamette is running high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:31 PM PST Wednesday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:31 PM PST Wednesday was 27.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Don`t drive into flooded areas. Find another route. Additional information is available at weather.gov/portland. The next statement will be issued tonight by 4 AM PST.
